structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Reports Of Suspected Acts Of Cruelty To Animals; Veterinarians; Immunity From Liability
law.text: A veterinarian duly registered under section 55 who reports, in good faith and in the normal course of business, a suspected act of cruelty to animals prohibited under section 77 or section 94 of chapter 272 to a police officer, or a special state police officer appointed under section 57 of chapter 22C, shall not be liable in a civil or criminal action for reporting such act.
